## 1. Quais fatores têm efeito significativo na chance de p1 decidir se encontrar novamente com p2? 

```{r dados, include=FALSE}
dates <- read_csv("speed-dating2.csv")
dates <- dates %>% 
  na.omit() %>%
  mutate(dec = case_when(.$dec == "no" ~ 0, 
                         .$dec == "yes" ~ 1))
```

```{r}
bm <- glm(dec ~ like, 
          data = dates, 
          family = "binomial")
tidy(bm, conf.int = TRUE, exponentiate = TRUE)
pR2(bm)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
bm %>% 
  augment(type.predict = "response")  %>% 
  mutate(matchNum = ifelse(dec == 1, 1, 0)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = like)) + 
  geom_count(aes(y = matchNum), alpha = 0.5) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = .fitted))
```
